title: "Eat Bitterness" - China's Hopeless Youth Give Up on Life
description:
See where your products on Amazon come from, save money, and get cash back with Cultivate - http://wecultivate.us/laowhy

China's youth unemployment is taking hold of Chinese society. Things are looking very bad, and the response from the leadership has been even worse. "Eat Bitterness", or suck it up, is the solution.
